title: Grinder
description: “Weird” has been the Petrov family’s bread and butter for generations, so Maks thought that he had a good handle on what was and wasn’t generally accepted as “normal”. He assumed that attending Maillardet’s Academy would mean (finally) making friends who would embrace his unique abilities. Mostly, he finds that everyone’s got their own definition for “freak”.
author: Kitty Burroughs
